name: Albert
overview: A French language 3D platformer, Q*bert's French brother, by Gilles Siffert and published in Hebdogiciel N°081 (03.05.1985). Albert is a game that consists of repainting all the bricks of a wall by simply jumping on them. Of course, we won't let you do as you please. So don't be surprised to see two pretty snakes rushing at you.
